comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Finally found something...but not much...WARNING...this is a BIG file...so you mightn't want to click the link to open it...it is a thesis written by CGU student Mark Hauser...it contains a data set of vaudeville performers who were active in Los Angeles in the period 1880-1914...the list mentions Will Shaw, a female impersonator who performed at a theatre in San Bernardino in 1905...(see p. 105). scholarship.claremont.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=107... ; Presumably Shaw was on the US/UK vaudeville circuit...I can't yet find a digitised newspaper hit, so my guess is he probably didn't visit Australia...
